description.ko: 음파가 액체 금속을 복잡하고 대칭적인 패턴으로 조각하며 소리를 시각적으로 형상화한 작품입니다.
description.en: The physical manifestation of sound waves as they sculpt liquid metal into complex, symmetrical patterns.

prompt: A sphere of liquid sapphire #4169E1 suspended in a silent void, exploding into sharp architectural spikes and vibrating ripples in response to a powerful invisible frequency. Minimalist lines in #FF4500 and #FFD700 intersect the form, creating a visual consonance of sound. 8k, Octane Render, raytracing. High-speed motion blur on the edges of the vibrating #32CD32 liquid metal, sharp focus on the central cymatic mandala reflecting the resonance of silence.
